channel.description: Recent content in paperclip on Barefoot Rob

item.title: blarg stupid paperclips
item.description: 19:40 Friday 27 October 2017 JST Playing the stupid paperclip game cost me $50. Okay, maybe I am stupid instead of the game, but due to its clever design, I waited to the last minute to get my train (for a substitute lesson in a location with which I am unfamiliar). My train ended up being late, I missed(*) my next connection, and the client said “screw it” and cancelled the lesson.
